data.description: You will NOT be disappointed in this lovely home! It is located in the highly desirable Lochwolde exclusive lake, swim and tennis community! As you cross the threshold, this lovely 5-bedroom, 4.5-bathroom traditional home impresses right away. Hardwood floors exude a legacy feel in the entryway and living areas, reflecting sunbeams of light. Your interior design preferences will find a blank slate of neutral coloring to work with. Even the ceilings are high impact, with styles including vaulted and tray. There are two fireplaces....a gas fireplace in the Great Room and a wood burning fireplace in the Keeping Room. Both will lend warmth to many gatherings! The spacious gourmet kitchen is recently updated, and features inspiring counter space and major appliances. A classic island configuration maximizes workspace and flexibility. The Owner's Retreat, which is located on the main level, is a roomy vessel for relaxation. Dual walk-in closets are more than enough room to keep everything organized. The other 3 bedrooms, with plenty of closet space and one with its own bathroom, are located upstairs for enhanced privacy. The finished basement, conveniently outfitted with a full bathroom, currently serves multiple purposes as home office, rec room, flex space, and guest sleeping quarters. The wet bar is great for entertaining! You can turn these rooms into whatever you please! The expansive yard (3.68 acres) has an "open space" feel. A driveway with ample accommodation for vehicles leads to an attached three-car garage. Representing the welcoming personality of the home, a front-facing, breezy porch is a nice spot for relaxing with beverages, perhaps while hosting friends. A grill and cooler is all you need to enjoy a nice evening on the deck! The home is found on a tranquil no-thruway street in an area of tree-lined streets. This GORGEOUS home is waiting for you! You're going to feel great waking up here every morning!
